short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful pages to start working as Support  Engineer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension it is working(redirecting to that URL) while being connected in a special VPN(Company VPN).Only like this can do the extension link /URL make work and reproduce. The page is a confluence one with contains "Useful pages to start working as Support OEC Engineer. "
The URL added within the extension can be opened only by the employees while they are entering related VPN password and user related. The URL added in extension cannot be opened by someone external, it will not work.
This extension is very useful for the new hire engineers to be able to access faster their  internal processes and needed internal role setup.
While clicking the extension, the new hires support  engineers , will be redirected and opened the internal page which contains all the needed and useful internal URLs and steps to help them have all they needed to be able to work and have the internal needed access.
